Oh?\""},{"lineNumber":44012,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガルティアの予想に反して、","translatedEnglishLine":"Contrary to Galtia’s well."},{"lineNumber":44014,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、はぐ、ぱく、もぐっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, nom, munch, chew...\""},{"lineNumber":44015,"originalJapaneseLine":"ひとつひとつの美味に頷きながら、","translatedEnglishLine":"Nodding at each delicious bite,"},{"lineNumber":44016,"originalJapaneseLine":"謙信が次から次へと皿を空にしていく。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kenshin emptied plate after plate."},{"lineNumber":44017,"originalJapaneseLine":"「次はこれをどうぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Next, please try one."},{"lineNumber":44020,"originalJapaneseLine":"　熱いのでお気を付けて」","translatedEnglishLine":"Be careful, it's hot.\""},{"lineNumber":44021,"originalJapaneseLine":"並んでいる料理を運び、食べ終えた皿を片付け、","translatedEnglishLine":"Carrying the lined-up dishes and clearing empty plates,"},{"lineNumber":44022,"originalJapaneseLine":"クルックーは給仕に徹していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Krukkū devoted herself entirely to serving."},{"lineNumber":44023,"originalJapaneseLine":"「法王が、そんなウェイトレスみたいな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The Pope acting like such a waitress...\""},{"lineNumber":44024,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この方が効率が良いです。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This way is more efficient."},{"lineNumber":44025,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私、そんなに食べないので」","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't eat that much.\""},{"lineNumber":44026,"originalJapaneseLine":"言いながら、運ぶ料理は味に緩急をつけ、","translatedEnglishLine":"While saying that, she varied the flavors of the dishes she carried,"},{"lineNumber":44027,"originalJapaneseLine":"必要なものには調味料を添え、","translatedEnglishLine":"Adding condiments where necessary,"},{"lineNumber":44028,"originalJapaneseLine":"箸で食べられるものを優先的に届けていく。","translatedEnglishLine":"She prioritized delivering things that could be eaten with chopsticks."},{"lineNumber":44029,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んく、んっ、はむっ……おかわり」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ngh, mm, munch... seconds please.\""},{"lineNumber":44030,"originalJapaneseLine":"周囲に料理が並べられては見る見るうちに無くなり、","translatedEnglishLine":"The dishes placed around quickly disappeared,"},{"lineNumber":44031,"originalJapaneseLine":"積み上げられた空き皿が謙信の邪魔にならないように","translatedEnglishLine":"And the stacked empty plates were carried away so as not to hinder Kenshin."},{"lineNumber":44032,"originalJapaneseLine":"運ばれていく。","translatedEnglishLine":"They were taken away."},{"lineNumber":44033,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へぇ…………やるもんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heh... impressive.\""},{"lineNumber":44034,"originalJapaneseLine":"「か、辛っ……！　辛いぞ、これっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"S-spicy...! This is spicy...!\""},{"lineNumber":44035,"originalJapaneseLine":"「が、頑張ってください、ランス様……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"P-please do your best, Lord Rance...\""},{"lineNumber":44036,"originalJapaneseLine":"　わ、わたし、もう…………うぷ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I-I’m already... ugh.\""},{"lineNumber":44037,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はぐはぐ、むぐむぐ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Munch munch, chew chew!"},{"lineNumber":44038,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こ、こっちは食べきるから、あとはランスが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ll finish this one, the rest is up to Rance...\""},{"lineNumber":44039,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええい、食っちゃるわーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Damn it, I’ll eat it all!\""},{"lineNumber":44040,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはピリ辛まんじゅうを、","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance shoved a spicy bun into his mouth,"},{"lineNumber":44041,"originalJapaneseLine":"強引に口の中に押し込んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"forcing it in aggressively."},{"lineNumber":44042,"originalJapaneseLine":"それと同時に、周りの料理は全て平らげられていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"At the same time, all the surrounding dishes had been finished."},{"lineNumber":44043,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん、んぐっ……！　げぶっ……ど、どーだ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nn, nguh...! Gah... So, how is it...?"},{"lineNumber":44044,"originalJapaneseLine":"　食ったぞ、この野郎…………！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I ate it, you bastard...!\""},{"lineNumber":44045,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………やるじゃねえか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Not bad at all.\""},{"lineNumber":44046,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガルティアは素直に感嘆した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Galtia honestly admired him."},{"lineNumber":44047,"originalJapaneseLine":"「限界を超えてんのに、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even though you’re beyond your limit,"},{"lineNumber":44048,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それでも一歩も引こうとしないとはな」","translatedEnglishLine":"you still won’t back down a single step.\""},{"lineNumber":44049,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん、ばかめ……引く理由がないわ。……げふっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, fool... There’s no reason to back down. ...Ugh.\""},{"lineNumber":44050,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へっ…………そうかよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heh... Is that so.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに、メディウサ…………」
「……親父から、連絡は？」
千鶴子は力なく、首を振った。
「まだまだ……幕引きには、遠いか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not yet... The curtain is far from closing..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぴしゃりと自分の頬を叩いて、
マジックは善後策へと意識を切り替えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic shifted her focus to damage control.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「っ、ぷぅ……食った食った」
ぽっかりと空洞がある腹を軽くさすって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rubbing her noticeably empty stomach lightly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアはいったん、満足の息を吐いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Galtia let out a breath of satisfaction for the moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さーて、そっちは…………おぉっ？」
ガルティアの予想に反して、
ランス達もほぼ全て、料理を平らげていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others had almost entirely finished their dishes as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ、はぐ、ぱく、もぐっ……」
ひとつひとつの美味に頷きながら、
謙信が次から次へと皿を空にしていく。
「次はこれをどうぞ」
「ああ。かたじけない、法王殿」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, thank you very much, Your Holiness."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その次はこちらを。
熱いのでお気を付けて」
並んでいる料理を運び、食べ終えた皿を片付け、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Carrying the lined-up dishes and clearing empty plates,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーは給仕に徹していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Krukkū devoted herself entirely to serving.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「法王が、そんなウェイトレスみたいな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Pope acting like such a waitress..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この方が効率が良いです。
私、そんなに食べないので」
言いながら、運ぶ料理は味に緩急をつけ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While saying that, she varied the flavors of the dishes she carried,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必要なものには調味料を添え、
箸で食べられるものを優先的に届けていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She prioritized delivering things that could be eaten with chopsticks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んく、んっ、はむっ……おかわり」
周囲に料理が並べられては見る見るうちに無くなり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The dishes placed around quickly disappeared,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 積み上げられた空き皿が謙信の邪魔にならないように
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And the stacked empty plates were carried away so as not to hinder Kenshin.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 運ばれていく。
「へぇ…………やるもんだ」
「か、辛っ……！　辛いぞ、これっ……！」
「が、頑張ってください、ランス様……
わ、わたし、もう…………うぷ」
「はぐはぐ、むぐむぐ！
こ、こっちは食べきるから、あとはランスが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll finish this one, the rest is up to Rance..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、食っちゃるわーーー！」
ランスはピリ辛まんじゅうを、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance shoved a spicy bun into his mouth,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 強引に口の中に押し込んだ。
それと同時に、周りの料理は全て平らげられていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the same time, all the surrounding dishes had been finished.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん、んぐっ……！　げぶっ……ど、どーだ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nn, nguh...! Gah... So, how is it...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食ったぞ、この野郎…………！」
「…………やるじゃねえか」
ガルティアは素直に感嘆した。
「限界を超えてんのに、
それでも一歩も引こうとしないとはな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you still won’t back down a single step."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、ばかめ……引く理由がないわ。……げふっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, fool... There’s no reason to back down. ...Ugh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へっ…………そうかよ」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

「……親父から、連絡は？」
千鶴子は力なく、首を振った。
「まだまだ……幕引きには、遠いか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not yet... The curtain is far from closing..."

マジックは善後策へと意識を切り替えた。

「ああ。かたじけない、法王殿」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その次はこちらを。
熱いのでお気を付けて」
並んでいる料理を運び、食べ終えた皿を片付け、

私、そんなに食べないので」
言いながら、運ぶ料理は味に緩急をつけ、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And the stacked empty plates were carried away so as not to hinder Kenshin.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance shoved a spicy bun into his mouth,

それと同時に、周りの料理は全て平らげられていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the same time, all the surrounding dishes had been finished.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん、んぐっ……！　げぶっ……ど、どーだ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nn, nguh...! Gah... So, how is it...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食ったぞ、この野郎…………！」
「…………やるじゃねえか」
ガルティアは素直に感嘆した。
「限界を超えてんのに、
それでも一歩も引こうとしないとはな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you still won’t back down a single step."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、ばかめ……引く理由がないわ。……げふっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, fool... There’s no reason to back down. ...Ugh."
